author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Mumsnet launches subscription plea in 'squeaky-bum time'
description: Parent platforms are having to adapt to survive as ad revenue declines.
content:
Image caption
 Mumsnet founder Justine Roberts said the platform had been hit by a steep decline in ad revenue
Mumsnet, the UK's biggest parent platform, has launched a subscription service following a steep decline in ad revenue.
The £4.99 monthly fee is … [+3115 chars]
